Uses of Class
entity.PacmanEntity

Packages that use PacmanEntity 
Package Description
controllers  
entity.ghost  

  • Uses of PacmanEntity in controllers

    Methods in controllers that return PacmanEntity 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    PacmanEntity EntityController.getPlayer()
    Fetches the PacmanEntity instance belonging to the Player with ID playerId

  • Uses of PacmanEntity in entity.ghost

    Methods in entity.ghost with parameters of type PacmanEntity 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GhostEntity.pacmanStateChange​(PacmanEntity e)
    This function is called by the PacmanEntity when it's state has changed; this allows all the ghosts to re-evaluate their status (tracking or fleeing) based on a callback, rather than polling the entity for it's state every tick.
